title: Lagspikes without Ping raise
body:
So since the last 2 patches i get lag spikes, that i cant see in the forums or anywhere else.
When i start the round nothing happens in particullary but after few minutes i get lags spikes from hell, but my ping is chilling at 32-55ms so m,y questions is what can cause it or whom i can blame for it, just kidding!
I would appreciate a solution to this problem.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
When you say lag spikes, do you see any change in your FPS. If not, this could be *packet loss*, but you'd typically see stuff like your champion running in place, or you see it sit in place while you take damage, then suddenly the game catches up to where you are now.

Is this what you're seeing?

Hey,

Don't know if we are in the same boat, but this is my post from today about my problems. 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/umbeWeU5-lagging-for-no-reason

Is this your problem? Your post sounds very similar to my issues....
